Title: Requires the chair of the public service commission create rules, regulations, policies, and procedures for the creation of a resilient electric vehicle charging system pilot program
Summary: Requires the chair of the public service commission create rules, regulations, policies, and procedures for the creation of a resilient electric vehicle charging system pilot program to provide power through an extended outage.
LawCode: Add §66-x, Pub Serv L; amd §§1005 & 1020-f, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the public authorities law, in relation to creating a resilient electric vehicle charging system pilot program
